workflow.meta: 其他业务审批（不需质控审批）

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where  id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_QTGLLCB') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 投资银行总部职能经理审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_QTGLLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'110000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_QTGLLCB",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where  id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 98 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_QTGLLCB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,99,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批
保荐业务部门负责人审批
内核办权益类团队负责人
保荐业务部门负责人审批
并购融资部总经理审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=111 and  GPLX = 3 ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=112 and  SFWCXC = 3 and SFCYBJDDQJ = 1",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt==1&&cnt1==0&&cnt2==0&&cnt3==0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=111 and  GPLX = 3 ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=112 and  SFWCXC = 3 and SFCYBJDDQJ = 1",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1||cnt3==1)

step.name: 并购融资部总经理审批

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=111 and  GPLX = 3 ",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and KPJD=112 and  SFWCXC = 3 and SFCYBJDDQJ = 1",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt3=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where id = ? and  KPJD in (113,114)  and SFWCXC = 3",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1||cnt3==1)
